com.intel.mnemonic.service.allocatorservice

Interface VolatileMemoryAllocatorService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    NonVolatileMemoryAllocatorService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PMallocServiceImpl, VMemServiceImpl

    public interface VolatileMemoryAllocatorService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long allocate(long id, long size, boolean initzero)
      allocate specified size of memory block from backed memory pool.
      void close(long id)
      close the memory pool through native interface.
      ByteBuffer createByteBuffer(long id, long size)
      create a ByteBuffer object which backed buffer is coming from backed native memory pool.
      void destroyByteBuffer(long id, ByteBuffer bytebuf)
      destroy a native memory block backed ByteBuffer object.
      void free(long id, long address)
      free a memory block by specify its address into backed memory pool.
      String getServiceId()
      Provide the service identifier for this allocator
      long init(long capacity, String uri, boolean isnew)
      Initialize a memory pool through native interface backed by native library.
      long reallocate(long id, long address, long size, boolean initzero)
      reallocate a specified size of memory block from backed memory pool.
      ByteBuffer resizeByteBuffer(long id, ByteBuffer bytebuf, long size)
      resize a ByteBuffer object which backed buffer is coming from backed native memory pool.
      void sync(long id)
      force to synchronize uncommitted data to backed memory pool through native interface.

    • Method Detail

      • getServiceId

        String getServiceId()
        Provide the service identifier for this allocator
        Returns:
        the service identifer of this allocator

      • init

        long init(long capacity,
          String uri,
          boolean isnew)
        Initialize a memory pool through native interface backed by native library.
        Parameters:
        capacity - the capacity of memory pool
        uri - the location of memory pool will be created
        isnew - a place holder, always specify it as true
        Returns:
        the identifier of created memory pool

      • close

        void close(long id)
        close the memory pool through native interface.

      • sync

        void sync(long id)
        force to synchronize uncommitted data to backed memory pool through native interface.

      • allocate

        long allocate(long id,
              long size,
              boolean initzero)
        allocate specified size of memory block from backed memory pool.
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of backed memory pool
        size - specify size of memory block to be allocated
        Returns:
        the address of allocated memory block from native memory pool

      • reallocate

        long reallocate(long id,
                long address,
                long size,
                boolean initzero)
        reallocate a specified size of memory block from backed memory pool.
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of backed memory pool
        address - the address of previous allocated memory block. it can be null.
        size - specify new size of memory block to be reallocated
        Returns:
        the address of reallocated memory block from native memory pool

      • free

        void free(long id,
          long address)
        free a memory block by specify its address into backed memory pool.
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of backed memory pool
        address - the address of allocated memory block.

      • createByteBuffer

        ByteBuffer createByteBuffer(long id,
                            long size)
        create a ByteBuffer object which backed buffer is coming from backed native memory pool.
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of backed memory pool
        size - the size of backed buffer that is managed by created ByteBuffer object.
        Returns:
        a created ByteBuffer object with a backed native memory block

      • resizeByteBuffer

        ByteBuffer resizeByteBuffer(long id,
                            ByteBuffer bytebuf,
                            long size)
        resize a ByteBuffer object which backed buffer is coming from backed native memory pool. NOTE: the ByteBuffer object will be renewed and lost metadata e.g. position, mark and etc.
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of backed memory pool
        bytebuf - the specified ByteBuffer object to be destroyed
        size - the new size of backed buffer that is managed by created ByteBuffer object.
        Returns:
        a created ByteBuffer object with a backed native memory block

      • destroyByteBuffer

        void destroyByteBuffer(long id,
                       ByteBuffer bytebuf)
        destroy a native memory block backed ByteBuffer object.
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of backed memory pool
        bytebuf - the specified ByteBuffer object to be destroyed
